Description: Behold! This pre-owned PRS Core Mark Holcomb Limited Edition Signature Custom 24 is an incredibly rare masterpiece, with a spectacularly well-bookmatched quilted maple 10-top and desirable signature “Holcomb Burst” finish. There is overwhelming demand and ultra-limited availability to get your hands on one of these core guitars (less than 50 in the world and this is the CORE not the cheap SE model), . That being said, with this sale comes an opportunity to wield the real-deal! As of the time of this listing’s creation, this is the only PRS Core Mark Holcomb for sale in the world.This guitar is in overall excellent condition, with only a few minor instances of play wear that we have carefully noted and pictured. There is a small amount of glossing underneath the highest string from where the previous owner’s hand rested, as well as some slight buckle rash on the back that can only be seen on certain angles that have been pictured. The fret life is exceptional and the frets/neck are clean, straight and true. This is an exciting piece in stellar condition! This guitar ships with the original hard shell case, which is in overall great condition .The bonus of my guitar is it has the best quilt top you will see on one of these models. This is your chance to grab a piece of history - I don't need to sell this guitar so no low ball offers please. Pickup from Mulgrave in Australia or I can send to most places in the world for $200AUD which is insured and shipped via UPS Expedited, it should reach you within 3-4 days. No CITES banned wood so I can ship internationally quickly! Please let me know any questions - I've taken as many pictures as possible so you can see the full condition - Comes in original case with certificate, etc. From the manufacturer: The band Periphery has become a force to be reckoned with in the progressive metal scene with their unique “djent” sound, poly–rhythmic patterns and soaring melodies. Guitarist Mark Holcomb helps achieve this full, lethal sound with his PRS guitar loaded with Seymour Duncan Mark Holcomb Signature Pickups dubbed “Alpha” and “Omega.” Features unique to the Mark Holcomb include a 25.5″ scale length rock maple neck with ebony fretboard and 20″ radius, satin finish, a newly designed PRS plate–style bridge, green abalone “J” birds, black Hipshot O–ring controls, and the guitarist’s signature Seymour Duncan “Alpha” and “Omega” pickups. Holcomb designed these pickups to be captivatingly clear and punchy – perfect for driving the Periphery sound. As with all Custom 24 models, the Holcomb also comes standard with a carved, figured maple “10” Top, mahogany back, 24 fret Pattern Thin neck, PRS Phase III locking tuners, and volume, tone, 5–way blade switch control layout.Body Color: Holcomb BurstBody Style: Custom 24Body Type: SolidbodyBrand: PRSCase/Gig Bag: Hard ShellCountry/Region of Manufacture: United StatesMPN: USDPRSCOREMHCU24Serial Number: 15220022
Title: Paul Reed Smith PRS Custom 24 Mark Holcomb Limited Edition USA Guitar
ConditionDescription: Great condition - 8.5/10 No major scratches or dings, no major issues.  Neck and frets perfect.  Some buckle rash on the back of guitar and sligh glossing of the matte top under the strings
